page.title: 02EAST MEON SHOPS.
page.content: East Meon Post Office is situated in the centre of the village.The Post Office and shop deal mainly with the sale of stamps.The payments for the social service are also made there and these include pensions and allowances of various types including child benefits.The Post Office also has a banking system known as National Girobank.There are also a variety of saving schemes which are run by the Post Office.The shop sells primarily sweets and cigarettes,greeting cards,toys,a selection of wools and habedashery,a selection of postcards of the village.The Sub_Post Mistress runs the Post Office and shop with the help of three asssistants.
